o = "foo"
-----
foo
=====
o = "foo" == "foo"
-----
True
=====
o = "foo" != "foo"
-----
False
=====
o = "foo" == "bar"
-----
False
=====
o = "foo" != "bar"
-----
True
=====
o = "foo" + "bar"
-----
foobar
=====
o = str("foo")
-----
foo
=====
o = "foo" + 5
-----
*param `right` for ffiObjectStringAdd.Right is *primitive.ObjectInt not *primitive.ObjectString
=====
o = "foo" == 5
-----
False
=====
o = "foo" != 5
-----
True
=====
o = repr("foo")
-----
string(foo)
